dataIdInfo.idPurp: The purpose of this dataset is to provide the Massachuesetts Office of Geographic Information with a polygon representation of the parcels for the Town of Halifax, Massachuesetts that comply with its Level III standards.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset is a polygon representation of the parcels for the Town of Halifax, Massachusetts. Edits to a base parcel file were made to the spatial and tabular data in order to bring the file in compliance with November 2010 MassGIS Level III Standards for Digital Parcel Files. These edits included ensuring that the parcel fabric was continuous and closed with no gaps or overlaps. Additionally, parcels were snapped to the legislatively approved MassGIS TOWNSSURVEY_ARC town boundary datalayer and compared against the 2008 30 cm MassGIS Ortho Imagery. Polygons were assigned a LOC_ID that links to the M131Assessor table and other fields were populated where they were known and applicable. Annual parcel updates completed May 2024. Geometry and attribute data updated on 5/2024
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Parcel mapping data maintained by CAI Technologies

idCitation.resTitle: Parcel data for Halifax, MA complying with Level 3 of MassGIS digital parcel standard

Consts.useLimit: This data may be appropriate for planning purposes. It should not be utilized where legal and surveyed property boundaries are required.

descript.abstract: Assessors parcel data for Town/City of Halifax. Developed from existing digital data that is maintained annually from deeds and plans using GIS software tools.

idinfo.accconst: This digital parcel data layer is considered to be in the public domain and will become accessible for download and display from the MassGIS website: http://www.mass.gov/mgis
idinfo.useconst: This data may be appropriate for planning purposes. It should not be utilized where legal and surveyed property boundaries are required.
idinfo.native: This parcel data is submitted to MassGIS in a file geodatabase. It will be incorporated into the MassGIS SDE database, and may be converted into other GIS data types for future distribution.

citeinfo.title: Parcel data for Halifax, MA complying with Level 3 of MassGIS digital parcel standard

dataqual.logic: This parcel layer contains discrete, non-overlapping polygons for each property. Adjacent polygons with common ownership and a single tax record have been retained in the "OthLeg" layer that accompanies this TaxPar layer, and dissolved into single parcels in this TaxPar layer. Some non-adjacent parcels may be represented by multi-part polygons where they share common ownership and a single tax record. Public rights-of-way (ROWs) exist as polygons, not null space. Linework associated with private ROWs are retained in the "OthLeg" layer. Water polygons also representing parcel boundaries have been retained in this TaxPar layer. Additional water features that are not considered parcel boundaries may have been placed in the "Misc" layer that accompanies this TaxPar layer. Easements and other similar non-fee taxable boundaries exist in the "OthLeg" layer, not the TaxPar layer. Based on municipality and/or record information, some TaxPar layer POLY_TYPE='ROW' violate v2.1 of the MassGIS Standard in that they are not always 'cut' by TaxPar layer POLY_TYPE = 'RAIL_ROW'. This is a MassGIS approved variation of the standard.

attracc.attraccr: 99.0% of parcels have a match in the CAMA export.

horizpa.horizpar: Original data compiled or reviewed for horizontal accuracy over the MassGIS color orthos from 2008/2009; these orthos are known to be +/- 10' horizontal; however, this data set cannot be used to reach authoritative conclusions about the horizontal accuracy of the boundaries depicted. That work requires a licensed land surveyor. Any updates to this data have been compiled on more recent orthophotography, base maps, or digital plans.

srcinfo.srccontr: Full Circle Tecnologies, Inc provided Coler and Colantonio, Inc wtih a base digital parcel file for Halifax.

procstep.procdesc: ESRI File Geodatabase entities projected, dissolved, copied, calculated, and generally manipulated to meet Mass GIS Level III standards. The source GIS data is not changed by this process.

overview.dsoverv: M118TaxPar represents a version of digital municipal parcels for the community of Halifax that is considered ‘level 3’ compliant per the specifications outlined in the MassGIS Standard for Digital Parcel Files. Its features can be linked in a GIS or database environment to a set of standardized assessing attributes in the table M118Assess by using the unique identifying values in the LOC_ID field. This data is also intended to be used in conjunction with associated (and optional) features in the ancillary data layers M118OthLeg and M118Misc. As one of the data sets identified by Massachusetts’ Strategic Plan for Spatial Data Infrastructure (http:/ /www.mass.gov/mgis/stratplan.html), this data enters the public domain as a valuable resource for mapping, planning, and analysis at all levels of government as well as the private sector.
overview.eaover:
For a full description of the features and attributes contained in this data, please refer to the MassGIS Standard for Digital Parcel Files - v2.1.
http://www.mass.gov/anf/research-and-tech/it-serv-and-support/application-serv/office-of-geographic-information-massgis/standards/standard-parcels.html

cntorgp.cntorg: Massachusetts Office of Geographic Information, Commonwealth of Massachusetts

distinfo.distliab: This parcel data is in the public domain and should not be redistributed for a fee beyond reproduction costs.

onlinopt.accinstr: Click on the "Download this layer" link to access all digital parcels.

distinfo.custom: Upon compliance with level 3 of the MassGIS Standard for Digital Parcel Files, this data will be made available for download on the MassGIS website: http://www.mass.gov/anf/research-and-tech/it-serv-and-support/application-serv/office-of-geographic-information-massgis/datalayers/l3parcels.html
